name: Hex Maze - like sudoku - The most difficult game
name_original: Hex Maze - like sudoku - The most difficult game
description:
If you like sudoku you will like this greatest challenge in "Hex Maze".

^^ 180 LEVELS ALL FREE.
^^ ENJOY with no time limit!
^^ EASY TO LEARN - hard to master!
^^ BEAUTIFUL backgrounds and music as you solve puzzles.
^^ TOP-NOTCH performance!
^^ FREE updates with new puzzles, boosts, and more!

Hex Maze is the BIGGEST-challenge puzzle game for you iPhone and iPod Touch.

If you like "Hex Maze" please be sure to rate the game below. Your feedback will help us make the games you love even better.

Please note that there are in-app items that you can purchase with real money. To delete this feature, on your device go to Setting Menu->General->Restrictions option. You can then simply turn off In-App Purchases under "Allowed Content".
